headlines.description: — Connor McDavid had a breakaway goal and an assist, 40-year-old Corey Perry scored again and the Edmonton Oilers are going to their second Stanley Cup Final in a row after beating the Dallas Stars 6-3 on Thursday night in Game 5 to wrap up the...
headlines.shortLinkText: McDavid and Oilers going back to Stanley Cup Final after 6-3 win over Stars in Game 5
